FuncDef: This command assigns a BGP local preference to routes matching a route policy statement entry.

ParaDef.Info:
The local preference expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 4294967295 

name - The local preference parameter variable name. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes. Policy parameters must start and end with at-signs (@); for example, "@variable@"..
